description:
Groups of public corporations

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
71321 Annual debt of the overall public budget

Definition:
This variable comprises the classification of public budgets
by the following groups of public corporations, which was
applicable until reference year 2005.
- Federation
- special funds of the Federation
- Länder
- municipalities / associations of municipalities
- special-purpose associations


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Groups of public corporations
